.New Zealand (Māori: Aotearoa  [aɔˈtɛaɾɔa]) bụ obodo agwaetiti dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Oke Osimiri Pasifik.  Ọ nwere nnukwu ala abụọ - North Island (Te Ika-a-Māui) na South Island (Te Waipunamu) - yana ihe karịrị agwaetiti 700.  Ọ bụ obodo agwaetiti nke isii kachasị na mpaghara, na-ekpuchi 268,021 square kilomita (103,500 sq mi).  New Zealand dị ihe dịka 2,000 kilomita (1,200 mi) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Australia n'ofe Osimiri Tasman na 1,000 kilomita (600 mi) ndịda agwaetiti New Caledonia, Fiji, na Tonga.  Ọdịdị ọdịdị ala dị iche iche nke mba ahụ na ugwu ndị dị nkọ, gụnyere Southern Alps, nwere ụgwọ dị ukwuu n'ịkwalite tectonic na mgbawa mgbawa.  Isi obodo New Zealand bụ Wellington, na obodo ya kacha nwee bụ Auckland.
